Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Boyue Beijing Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Beijing, convenient to Lady Street and Lama Temple. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of National Agricultural Exhibition Center and Nali Patio.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 219 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Boyue Beijing Hotel, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Check-in time starts at 14:00:00 Check-out time is 12:00:00
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Boyue Beijing Hotel, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lady Street - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
National Agricultural Exhibition Center - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Nali Patio - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Yashow Market - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Workers Stadium - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Chaoyang Park - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Green T. House Art Gallery - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Tiandi Theater - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Poly Theater - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Dongsishitiao Bridge - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Chaoyang Theater - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Dong Yue Miao - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Lama Temple - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Ditan Park - 4 km / 2.5 mi
798 Space - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Boyue Beijing Hotel is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 17.7 km / 11 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Renaissance Beijing Chaoyang Hotel is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi.
